Package de.ipk_gatersleben.bit.bi.isa4j.components

Class Assay

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ipk_gatersleben.bit.bi.isa4j.components.WideTableFile
      • de.ipk_gatersleben.bit.bi.isa4j.components.Assay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Commentable
    public class Assay
extends WideTableFile
implements Commentable
    Class to represent an assay in the ISA hierarchy. It is used to describe the measured traits and belongs to a Study
